title: New Google Leak Reveals Pixel 8 Design Secrets

description: He has an uncanny ability to come up with out-of-the-box ideas by connecting seemingly unrelated disciplines.

title: A Psychologist Suggests Unlearning These 3 Myths About Love

title: Blastomycosis Fungal Outbreak In Michigan Paper Mill: 1 Dead, 12 Hospitalized
description: All 97 of the confirmed and probable cases had spent time at the Billerud Paper Mill as employees, contractors, or other types of visitors.

title: The Alleged ‘Destiny 2’ Leaker Is A Well-Known Streamer, And He Denies It Was Him
description: Things have taken a turn in the Destiny 2 leak saga, where a presentation from an internal Bungie Community Summit was published online in a series of photographs and additional information was disseminated through a third party on Discord.

title: Reviving The Dead With AI: Is It Really Worth It?
description: If AI could let you speak with your  deceased loved ones again, would you take the chance? It’s not a rhetorical question. A few companies and experts believe this will soon be possible, and some are even starting to market their own solutions.

title: ‘Redfall’ Shouldn’t Be Delayed Due To Its FPS, But Because Of Its Release Date
description: Redfall garnered a lot of criticism last week when it announced that it was going to launch only with a 30 FPS quality mode on both Xbox Series S and even Series X, with a 60 FPS performance mode coming at a later date.

title: Is Ubisoft’s ‘XDefiant’ Somehow A Real Threat To ‘Call Of Duty’?
description: XDefiant is in closed beta testing, but footage is being shared far and wide. And one thing I keep hearing from players and content creators who do not appear to be getting paid by Ubisoft is that this may actually be a real competitor to Call of Duty, a series which has grown complacent.

title: ‘Beef’ Dethroned In Netflix’s Top 10 List By A New Show
description: Here's what new show has knocked Beef off the #1 spot in Netflix's top 10 list.

title: That New Car Smell Could Bring Cancer Risk, Study Says
description: Don Draper once said on the TV show Mad Men that “Happiness is the smell of a new car.” Well, a study just published in Cell Reports Physical Science found something besides happiness.

title: Saramonic Announces BlinkMe Wireless Smart Microphone With Color Touchscreen
description: The Saramonic BlinkMe wireless mic system includes two transmitters and a receiver. The units have a unique circular touchscreen and are ideal for content creators producing video for TikToK, Instagram and YouTube.

title: ‘The Mandalorian’ Season 3 Finale Will ‘Hurt Too Much’ — Is Mando Going To Die?

title: The Classes ‘Diablo 4’ Is Buffing And Nerfing For Launch After The Betas
description: Well, I have to give Blizzard a lot of credit here, they have not just taken feedback from Diablo 4’s pair of betas last month, but they are implementing a lot of feedback in time for launch.

title: Bungie Says The ‘Destiny 2’ Season 21 Leaker Was A Trusted Summit Attendee
description: Since close to the launch of Lightfall itself, a second, very major Destiny 2 leak has been making the rounds. The bulk of it is what appear to be snaps of an internal Bungie presentation about mainly season 21 and some later content to come.

title: AI Aspiring Toward All-In Global Geopolitical Multilateral Unity Arrangement For Sake Of Humanity Says AI Ethics And AI Law
description: Advocates of AI are saying that we need large-scale global multilateral arrangements to try and prevent an AI apocalyptical nightmare upon humankind. I explore what this all means and whether it is feasible, doing so with an eye toward AI Ethics and AI Law.

title: Discord Leaks Reveal Chinese Spy Balloons Are Named For Mob Bosses
description: Whitey Bulger, Donald Killeen and Tony “Big Tuna” Accardo were all big names in organized crime during the 20th century. But they’re also the names given to Chinese spy balloons by U.S. intelligence, according to documents leaked on Discord over the past few months.
